## Main findings about the collection

Let's take a look at the summary of findings about this collection, including average numbers of publications per authors and citations per publication. 
```{r Descriptive Analysis, echo=TRUE, comment=NA}
#options(width=160)
results <- biblioAnalysis(M)
summary(results, k=10, pause=F, width=130)
plot(x=results, k=10, pause=F)
```
## Most Cited References

```{r Most cited references,  comment=NA}
CR <- citations(M, field = "article", sep = ";")
cbind(CR$Cited[1:20])
```
